title: WEIS wind turbine modeling options schema
description: Schema that describes the modeling options for WEIS

verbosity.description: Prints additional outputs to screen (and to a file log in the future)

solver_maxiter.description: Number of iterations for the top-level coupling solver

OF_run_dir.description: Path to place FAST output files (e.g. /home/user/myturbines/output)

generate_af_coords.description: Flag to write airfoil coordinates out or not

use_exe.description: Use openfast executable instead of library

model_only.description: Flag to only generate an OpenFAST model and stop

keep_time.description: Keep timeseries in openmdao_openfast for post-processing

save_iterations.description: Save summary stats and other info for each openfast iteration.  Could bump this up to a more global post-processing input.

FAST_exe.description: Path to FAST executable to override default WEIS value (e.g. /home/user/OpenFAST/bin/openfast).  Note that if you use this, ROSCO must use the same compilation configuration.  You can specify the ROSCO dll with path2dll.

FAST_lib.description: Path to FAST dynamic library to override default WEIS value (e.g. /home/user/OpenFAST/lib/libopenfast.so)

turbsim_exe.description: Path to turbsim executable to override default WEIS value (e.g. /home/user/OpenFAST/bin/turbsim)

allow_fails.description: Allow WEIS to continue if OpenFAST fails?  All outputs will be filled with fail_value. Use with caution!

fail_value.decription: All OpenFAST outputs will be filled with this if the simulation fails.

write_stdout.description: Write standard output to own file.  Output will not print to screen.

goodman_correction.description: Flag whether to apply the Goodman correction for mean stress value to the stress amplitude value in fatigue calculations

WISDEM.description: Options for running WISDEM.  No further options are included in this file.  They are populated using the modeling schema in the WISDEM project in python.

flag.description: Whether or not to run this module

n_aoa.description: Number of angles of attack in a common grid to define polars

n_xy.description: Number of coordinate point used to define airfoils

n_span.description: Number of spanwise stations in a common grid used to define blade properties

n_pc.description: Number of wind speeds to compute the power curve

n_pc_spline.description: Number of wind speeds to spline the power curve

n_pitch_perf_surfaces.description: Number of pitch angles to determine the Cp-Ct-Cq-surfaces

min_pitch_perf_surfaces.description: Min pitch angle of the Cp-Ct-Cq-surfaces

max_pitch_perf_surfaces.description: Max pitch angle of the Cp-Ct-Cq-surfaces

n_tsr_perf_surfaces.description: Number of tsr values to determine the Cp-Ct-Cq-surfaces

n_U_perf_surfaces.description: Number of wind speeds to determine the Cp-Ct-Cq-surfaces

regulation_reg_III.description: Flag to derive the regulation trajectory in region III in terms of pitch and TSR

spar_cap_ss.description: Composite layer modeling the spar cap on the suction side in the geometry yaml. This entry is used to compute ultimate strains.

spar_cap_ps.description: Composite layer modeling the spar cap on the pressure side in the geometry yaml. This entry is used to compute ultimate strains.

te_ss.description: Composite layer modeling the trailing edge reinforcement on the suction side in the geometry yaml. This entry is used to compute ultimate strains.

te_ps.description: Composite layer modeling the trailing edge reinforcement on the pressure side in the geometry yaml. This entry is used to compute ultimate strains.

gamma_freq.description: Partial safety factor on modal frequencies

gust_std.description: Number of standard deviations for strength of gust

root_fastener_s_f.description: Safety factor for the max stress of blade root fasteners

hubloss.description: Include Prandtl hub loss model in CCBlade calls

tiploss.description: Include Prandtl tip loss model in CCBlade calls

wakerotation.description: Include effect of wake rotation (i.e., tangential induction factor is nonzero) in CCBlade calls

usecd.description: Use drag coefficient in computing induction factors in CCBlade calls

n_sector.description: Number of sectors to divide rotor face into in computing thrust and power.

3d_af_correction.description: Flag switching on and off the 3d DU-Selig airfoil correction implemented in Polar.py

inn_af.description: Flag switching on and off the inverted neural network for airfoil design

inn_af_max_rthick.description: Maximum airfoil thickness supported by the INN for airfoil design

inn_af_min_rthick.description: Minimum airfoil thickness supported by the INN for airfoil design

rail_transport.description: Flag switching on and off the rail transport module of RotorSE

flag.description: Whether or not to run this module

model_generator.description: Whether or not to do detailed generator modeling using tools formerly in GeneratorSE

gamma_n.description: Partial safety factor for consequence of failure

use_gb_torque_density.description: Flag switching between running to gearbox sizing of DrivetrainSE (False) or the simple sizing given a value of torque density expressed in Nm/kg

hub_gamma.description: Partial safety factor for hub sizing

spinner_gamma.description: Partial safety factor for spinner sizing

flag.description: Whether or not to run this module

gamma_n.description: Partial safety factor for consequence of failure

gamma_freq.description: Partial safety factor on modal frequencies

gamma_fatigue.description: Partial safety factor for fatigue failure

buckling_method.description: Buckling utilization calculation method- Eurocode 1994 or DNVGL RP-C202

buckling_length.description: Buckling length factor in Eurocode safety check

frame3dd.description: Set of Frame3DD options used for tower analysis

shear.description: Inclusion of shear area for symmetric sections

geom.description: Inclusion of shear stiffening through axial loading

tol.description: Convergence tolerance for modal eigenvalue solution

n_refine.description: Number of Frame3DD element refinements for every specified section along tower/member

flag.description: Whether or not to run this module

gamma_n.description: Partial safety factor for consequence of failure

gamma_freq.description: Partial safety factor on modal frequencies

gamma_fatigue.description: Partial safety factor for fatigue failure

buckling_method.description: Buckling utilization calculation method- Eurocode 1994 or DNVGL RP-C202

buckling_length.description: Buckling length factor in Eurocode safety check

frame3dd.description: Set of Frame3DD options used for tower analysis

shear.description: Inclusion of shear area for symmetric sections

geom.description: Inclusion of shear stiffening through axial loading

tol.description: Convergence tolerance for modal eigenvalue solution

soil_springs.description: If False, then a monopile is modeled with a perfectly clamped foundation.  If True, then spring-stiffness equivalents are computed from soil properties for all DOF.

gravity_foundation.description: Model the monopile base as a gravity-based foundation with no pile embedment

n_refine.description: Number of Frame3DD element refinements for every specified section along tower/member

n_legs.description: Number of legs for the jacket. Only used if `type`==`jacket`.

n_bays.description: Number of bays for the jacket, or x-joints per tower leg pair. Only used if `type`==`jacket`.

mud_brace.description: If true, add a mud brace at the bottom of each jacket leg. Only used if `type`==`jacket`.

save_truss_figures.description: If true, save .pngs of the jacket truss during analysis or optimization. Jacket only.

flag.description: Whether or not to run this module
Whether or not to run this module

n_refine.description: Number of Frame3DD element refinements for every specified section along tower/member

frame3dd.description: Set of Frame3DD options used for floating tower analysis

shear.description: Inclusion of shear area for symmetric sections

geom.description: Inclusion of shear stiffening through axial loading

shift.description: Numerical matrix diagonal adder for eigenvalue solve of unrestrained structure

tol.description: Convergence tolerance for modal eigenvalue solution

gamma_n.description: Partial safety factor for consequence of failure

gamma_freq.description: Partial safety factor on modal frequencies

gamma_fatigue.description: Partial safety factor for fatigue failure

symmetric_moorings.description: Whether or not to assume a symmetric mooring system

Loading.description: This is only used if not running the full WISDEM turbine Group and you need to input the mass properties, forces, and moments for a tower-only or nacelle-only analysis

mass.description: Mass at external boundary of the system.  For the tower, this would be the RNA mass.

center_of_mass.description: Distance from system boundary to center of mass of the applied load.  For the tower, this would be the RNA center of mass in tower-top coordinates.

moment_of_inertia.description: Moment of inertia of external mass in coordinate system at the system boundary.  For the tower, this would be the RNA MoI in tower-top coordinates.

loads.description: The loading scenarios associated with the applied mass.  For the tower, this would be operating, parked, etc.

force.description: Force vector applied at system boundary

moment.description: Force vector applied at system boundary

velocity.description: Applied wind reference velocity, if necessary

RAFT.description: Options for WEIS fidelity level 1 = frequency domain (RAFT)

flag.description: Whether or not to run WEIS fidelity level 1 = frequency domain (RAFT)

min_freq.description: Minimum frequency to evaluate (frequencies will be min_freq:min_freq:max_freq)

max_freq.description: Maximum frequency to evaluate (frequencies will be min_freq:min_freq:max_freq)

potential_bem_members.description: List of submerged member names to model with potential flow boundary element methods.  Members not listed here will be modeled with strip theory

potential_model_override.description: User override for potential boundary element modeling. 0 = uses the potential_bem_members list for inviscid force and computes viscous drag with strip theory (members not listed use only strip theory), 1 = no potential BEM modeling for any member (just strip theory), 2 = potential BEM modeling for all members (no strip theory)

xi_start.description: Initial amplitude of each DOF for all frequencies

nIter.description: Number of iterations to solve dynamics

min_freq_BEM.description: lowest frequency and frequency interval to use in BEM analysis

trim_ballast.description: Use RAFT to trim ballast so that average heave is near 0 (0 - no trim, 1 - adjust compartment fill values, 2 - adjust ballast density, recommended for now)

OpenFAST.description: Options for WEIS fidelity level 3 = nonlinear time domain

flag.description: Whether or not to run WEIS fidelity level 3 = nonlinear time domain (Linearize OpenFAST)

AbortLevel.description: Error level when simulation should abort (string) {'WARNING', 'SEVERE', 'FATAL'}

InterpOrder.description: Interpolation order for input/output time history (-) {1=linear, 2=quadratic}

NumCrctn.description: Number of correction iterations (-) {0=explicit calculation, i.e., no corrections}

DT_UJac.description: Time between calls to get Jacobians (s)

CompElast.description: Compute structural dynamics (switch) {1=ElastoDyn; 2=ElastoDyn + BeamDyn for blades}

CompInflow.description: Compute inflow wind velocities (switch) {0=still air; 1=InflowWind; 2=external from OpenFOAM}

MHK.description: MHK turbine type (switch) {0=Not an MHK turbine; 1=Fixed MHK turbine; 2=Floating MHK turbine}

SpdSound.description: Speed of sound in working fluid (m/s)

Patm.description: Atmospheric pressure (Pa) [used only for an MHK turbine cavitation check]

Pvap.description: Vapour pressure of working fluid (Pa) [used only for an MHK turbine cavitation check]

MSL2SWL.description: Offset between still-water level and mean sea level (m) [positive upward]

EDFile.description: Name of file containing ElastoDyn input parameters (quoted string)

BDBldFile(1).description: Name of file containing BeamDyn input parameters for blade 1 (quoted string)

BDBldFile(2).description: Name of file containing BeamDyn input parameters for blade 2 (quoted string)

BDBldFile(3).description: Name of file containing BeamDyn input parameters for blade 3 (quoted string)

InflowFile.description: Name of file containing inflow wind input parameters (quoted string)

AeroFile.description: Name of file containing aerodynamic input parameters (quoted string)

ServoFile.description: Name of file containing control and electrical-drive input parameters (quoted string)

HydroFile.description: Name of file containing hydrodynamic input parameters (quoted string)

SubFile.description: Name of file containing sub-structural input parameters (quoted string)

MooringFile.description: Name of file containing mooring system input parameters (quoted string)

IceFile.description: Name of file containing ice input parameters (quoted string)

SttsTime.description: Amount of time between screen status messages (s)

ChkptTime.description: Amount of time between creating checkpoint files for potential restart (s)

OutFileFmt.description: Format for tabular (time-marching) output file (switch) {1 text file [<RootName>.out], 2 binary file [<RootName>.outb], 3 both}

TabDelim.description: Use tab delimiters in text tabular output file? (flag) (currently unused)

OutFmt.description: Format used for text tabular output (except time).  Resulting field should be 10 characters. (quoted string (currently unused)

CalcSteady.description: Calculate a steady-state periodic operating point before linearization? [unused if Linearize=False] (flag)

TrimCase.description: Controller parameter to be trimmed {1:yaw; 2:torque; 3:pitch} [used only if CalcSteady=True] (-)

TrimTol.description: Tolerance for the rotational speed convergence [used only if CalcSteady=True] (-)

TrimGain.description: Proportional gain for the rotational speed error (>0) [used only if CalcSteady=True] (rad/(rad/s) for yaw or pitch; Nm/(rad/s) for torque)

Twr_Kdmp.description: Damping factor for the tower [used only if CalcSteady=True] (N/(m/s))

Bld_Kdmp.description: Damping factor for the blades [used only if CalcSteady=True] (N/(m/s))

NLinTimes.description: Number of times to linearize (-) [>=1] [unused if Linearize=False]

LinTimes.description: List of times at which to linearize (s) [1 to NLinTimes] [used only when Linearize=True and CalcSteady=False]

LinInputs.description: Inputs included in linearization (switch) {0=none; 1=standard; 2=all module inputs (debug)} [unused if Linearize=False]

LinOutputs.description: Outputs included in linearization (switch) {0=none; 1=from OutList(s); 2=all module outputs (debug)} [unused if Linearize=False]

LinOutJac.description: Include full Jacobians in linearization output (for debug) (flag) [unused if Linearize=False; used only if LinInputs=LinOutputs=2]

LinOutMod.description: Write module-level linearization output files in addition to output for full system? (flag) [unused if Linearize=False]

WrVTK.description: VTK visualization data output (switch) {0=none; 1=initialization data only; 2=animation}

VTK_type.description: Type of VTK visualization data (switch) {1=surfaces; 2=basic meshes (lines/points); 3=all meshes (debug)} [unused if WrVTK=0]

VTK_fields.description: Write mesh fields to VTK data files? (flag) {true/false} [unused if WrVTK=0]

VTK_fps.description: Frame rate for VTK output (frames per second){will use closest integer multiple of DT} [used only if WrVTK=2]

WindType.description: Switch for wind file type (1=steady; 2=uniform; 3=binary TurbSim FF; 4=binary Bladed-style FF; 5=HAWC format; 6=User defined; 7=native Bladed FF)

PropagationDir.description: Direction of wind propagation (meteoroligical rotation from aligned with X (positive rotates towards -Y) -- degrees)

VFlowAng.description: Upflow angle (degrees) (not used for native Bladed format WindType=7)

VelInterpCubic.description: Use cubic interpolation for velocity in time (false=linear, true=cubic) [Used with WindType=2,3,4,5,7]

NWindVel.description: Number of points to output the wind velocity (0 to 9)

RefHt.description: Reference height for horizontal wind speed (m)

Filename_Uni.description: Filename of time series data for uniform wind field [used only for WindType = 2]

RefHt_Uni.description: Reference height for horizontal wind speed (m)

RefLength.description: Reference length for linear horizontal and vertical sheer (-) [used only for WindType = 2]

FileName_BTS.description: Name of the Full field wind file to use (.bts) [used only for WindType = 3]

FilenameRoot.description: Rootname of the full-field wind file to use (.wnd, .sum) [used only for WindType = 4]

TowerFile.description: Have tower file (.twr) (flag) [used only for WindType = 4]

FileName_u.description: Name of the file containing the u-component fluctuating wind (.bin) [Only used with WindType = 5]

FileName_v.description: Name of the file containing the v-component fluctuating wind (.bin) [Only used with WindType = 5]

FileName_w.description: Name of the file containing the w-component fluctuating wind (.bin) [Only used with WindType = 5]

nx.description: Number of grids in the x direction (in the 3 files above) (-)

ny.description: Number of grids in the y direction (in the 3 files above) (-)

nz.description: Number of grids in the z direction (in the 3 files above) (-)

dx.description: Distance (in meters) between points in the x direction    (m)

dy.description: Distance (in meters) between points in the y direction    (m)

dz.description: Distance (in meters) between points in the z direction    (m)

RefHt_Hawc.description: Reference height for horizontal wind speed (m)

ScaleMethod.description: Turbulence scaling method   [0 = none, 1 = direct scaling, 2 = calculate scaling factor based on a desired standard deviation]

SFx.description: Turbulence scaling factor for the x direction (-)   [ScaleMethod=1]

SFy.description: Turbulence scaling factor for the y direction (-)   [ScaleMethod=1]

SFz.description: Turbulence scaling factor for the z direction (-)   [ScaleMethod=1]

SigmaFx.description: Turbulence standard deviation to calculate scaling from in x direction (m/s)    [ScaleMethod=2]

SigmaFy.description: Turbulence standard deviation to calculate scaling from in y direction (m/s)    [ScaleMethod=2]

SigmaFz.description: Turbulence standard deviation to calculate scaling from in z direction (m/s)    [ScaleMethod=2]

URef.description: Mean u-component wind speed at the reference height (m/s) [HAWC-format files]

PLExp_Hawc.description: Power law exponent (-) (used for PL wind profile type only)[HAWC-format files]

Z0.description: Surface roughness length (m) (used for LG wind profile type only)[HAWC-format files]

XOffset.description: Initial offset in +x direction (shift of wind box)

SensorType.description: Switch for lidar configuration (0 = None, 1 = Single Point Beam(s), 2 = Continuous, 3 = Pulsed)

NumPulseGate.description: Number of lidar measurement gates (used when SensorType = 3)

PulseSpacing.description: Distance between range gates (m) (used when SensorType = 3)

NumBeam.description: Number of lidar measurement beams (0-5)(used when SensorType = 1)

FocalDistanceX.description: Focal distance coordinates of the lidar beam in the x direction (relative to hub height) (only first coordinate used for SensorType 2 and 3) (m)

FocalDistanceY.description: Focal distance coordinates of the lidar beam in the y direction (relative to hub height) (only first coordinate used for SensorType 2 and 3) (m)

FocalDistanceZ.description: Focal distance coordinates of the lidar beam in the z direction (relative to hub height) (only first coordinate used for SensorType 2 and 3) (m)

RotorApexOffsetPos.description: Offset of the lidar from hub height (m)

URefLid.description: Reference average wind speed for the lidar [m/s]

LidRadialVel.description: TRUE => return radial component, FALSE => return 'x' direction estimate

ConsiderHubMotion.description: Flag whether to consider the hub motion's impact on Lidar measurements

flag.description: Whether or not to run AeroDyn

DTAero.description: Time interval for aerodynamic calculations. Set it to 0. for default (same as main fst)

AFAeroMod.description: Type of blade airfoil aerodynamics model (switch) {1=steady model, 2=Beddoes-Leishman unsteady model} [must be 1 when linearizing]

TwrPotent.description: Type tower influence on wind based on potential flow around the tower (switch) {0=none, 1=baseline potential flow, 2=potential flow with Bak correction}

TwrShadow.description: Calculate tower influence on wind based on downstream tower shadow (switch) {0=none, 1=Powles model, 2=Eames model}

FrozenWake.description: Assume frozen wake during linearization? (flag) [used only when WakeMod=1 and when linearizing]

CavitCheck.description: Perform cavitation check? (flag) TRUE will turn off unsteady aerodynamics

CompAA.description: Flag to compute AeroAcoustics calculation [only used when WakeMod=1 or 2]

SkewMod.description: Type of skewed-wake correction model (switch) {1=uncoupled, 2=Pitt/Peters, 3=coupled} [used only when WakeMod=1]

SkewModFactor.description: Constant used in Pitt/Peters skewed wake model {or 'default' is 15/32*pi} (-) [used only when SkewMod=2; unused when WakeMod=0]

TipLoss.description: Use the Prandtl tip-loss model? (flag) [used only when WakeMod=1]

HubLoss.description: Use the Prandtl hub-loss model? (flag) [used only when WakeMod=1]

TanInd.description: Include tangential induction in BEMT calculations? (flag) [used only when WakeMod=1]

AIDrag.description: Include the drag term in the axial-induction calculation? (flag) [used only when WakeMod=1]

TIDrag.description: Include the drag term in the tangential-induction calculation? (flag) [used only when WakeMod=1 and TanInd=TRUE]

IndToler.description: Convergence tolerance for BEMT nonlinear solve residual equation {or 0.0 for default} (-) [used only when WakeMod=1]

MaxIter.description: Maximum number of iteration steps (-) [used only when WakeMod=1]

DBEMT_Mod.description: Type of dynamic BEMT (DBEMT) model {1=constant tau1, 2=time-dependent tau1, 3=constant tau1 with continuous formulation} (-) [used only when WakeMod=2]

tau1_const.description: Time constant for DBEMT (s) [used only when WakeMod=2 and DBEMT_Mod=1]

OLAFInputFileName.description: Input file for OLAF [used only when WakeMod=3]

IntMethod.description: Integration method 1 RK4, 5 Forward Euler 1st order, default 5 switch

DTfvw.description: Time interval for wake propagation. {default dtaero} (s)

FreeWakeStart.description: Time when wake is free. (-) value = always free. {default 0.0} (s)

FullCircStart.description: Time at which full circulation is reached. {default 0.0} (s)

CircSolvMethod.description: Circulation solving method {1 Cl-Based, 2 No-Flow Through, 3 Prescribed, default 1 }(switch)

CircSolvMaxIter.description: Maximum number of iterations for circulation solving {default 30} (-)

PrescribedCircFile.description: File containing prescribed circulation [only if CircSolvMethod=3] (quoted string)

nNWPanelsFree.description: Number of free near-wake panels (-) {default nNWPanels}

nFWPanelsFree.description: Number of free far-wake panels (-) {default nFWPanels}

FWShedVorticity.description: Include shed vorticity in the far wake {default false}

DiffusionMethod.description: Diffusion method to account for viscous effects {0 None, 1 Core Spreading, 'default' 0}

RegDeterMethod.description: Method to determine the regularization parameters {0  Manual, 1 Optimized, 2 chord, 3 span default 0 }

RegFunction.description: Viscous diffusion function {0 None, 1 Rankine, 2 LambOseen, 3 Vatistas, 4 Denominator, 'default' 3} (switch)

WakeRegMethod.description: Wake regularization method {1 Constant, 2 Stretching, 3 Age, default 1} (switch)

CoreSpreadEddyVisc.description: Eddy viscosity in core spreading methods, typical values 1-1000

TwrShadowOnWake.description: Include tower flow disturbance effects on wake convection {default:false} [only if TwrPotent or TwrShadow]

ShearModel.description: Shear Model {0 No treatment, 1 Mirrored vorticity, default 0}

VelocityMethod.description: Method to determine the velocity {1Biot-Savart Segment, 2Particle tree, default 1}

TreeBranchFactor.description: Branch radius fraction above which a multipole calculation is used {default 2.0} [only if VelocityMethod=2]

PartPerSegment.description: Number of particles per segment [only if VelocityMethod=2]

WrVTk.description: Outputs Visualization Toolkit (VTK) (independent of .fst option) {0 NoVTK, 1 Write VTK at each time step} (flag)

nVTKBlades.description: Number of blades for which VTK files are exported {0 No VTK per blade, n VTK for blade 1 to n} (-)

VTKCoord.description: Coordinate system used for VTK export. {1 Global, 2 Hub, 3 Both, 'default' 1}

VTK_fps.description: Frame rate for VTK output (frames per second) {"all" for all glue code timesteps, "default" for all OLAF timesteps} [used only if WrVTK=1]

nGridOut.description: (GB DEBUG 7/8) Number of grid points for VTK output

UAMod.description: Unsteady Aero Model Switch (switch) {1=Baseline model (Original), 2=Gonzalez's variant (changes in Cn,Cc,Cm), 3=Minemma/Pierce variant (changes in Cc and Cm)} [used only when AFAeroMod=2]

FLookup.description: Flag to indicate whether a lookup for f' will be calculated (TRUE) or whether best-fit exponential equations will be used (FALSE); if FALSE S1-S4 must be provided in airfoil input files (flag) [used only when AFAeroMod=2]

UAStartRad.description: Starting radius for dynamic stall (fraction of rotor radius) [used only when AFAeroMod=2]

UAEndRad.description: Ending radius for dynamic stall (fraction of rotor radius) [used only when AFAeroMod=2]

AFTabMod.description: Interpolation method for multiple airfoil tables {1=1D interpolation on AoA (first table only); 2=2D interpolation on AoA and Re; 3=2D interpolation on AoA and UserProp} (-)

InCol_Alfa.description: The column in the airfoil tables that contains the angle of attack (-)

InCol_Cl.description: The column in the airfoil tables that contains the lift coefficient (-)

InCol_Cd.description: The column in the airfoil tables that contains the drag coefficient (-)

InCol_Cm.description: The column in the airfoil tables that contains the pitching-moment coefficient; use zero if there is no Cm column (-)

InCol_Cpmin.description: The column in the airfoil tables that contains the Cpmin coefficient; use zero if there is no Cpmin column (-)

UseBlCm.description: Include aerodynamic pitching moment in calculations?  (flag)

HubCenBx.description: Hub center of buoyancy x direction offset (m)

NacCenB.description: Position of nacelle center of buoyancy from yaw bearing in nacelle coordinates (m)

TFinFile.description: Input file for tail fin aerodynamics [used only when TFinAero=True]

Pvap.description: Vapour pressure of fluid (Pa) [used only when CavitCheck=True]

FluidDepth.description: Water depth above mid-hub height (m) [used only when CavitCheck=True]

TwrTI.description: Turbulence intensity used in the Eames tower shadow model. Values of TwrTI between 0.05 and 0.4 are recommended.

TeetDefl.description: Initial or fixed teeter angle (radians) [unused for 3 blades]

PtfmSurge.description: Initial or fixed horizontal surge translational displacement of platform (meters)

PtfmSway.description: Initial or fixed horizontal sway translational displacement of platform (meters)

PtfmHeave.description: Initial or fixed vertical heave translational displacement of platform (meters)

PtfmRoll.description: Initial or fixed roll tilt rotational displacement of platform (radians)

PtfmPitch.description: Initial or fixed pitch tilt rotational displacement of platform (radians)

PtfmYaw.description: Initial or fixed yaw rotational displacement of platform (radians)

UndSling.description: Undersling length [distance from teeter pin to the rotor apex] (meters) [unused for 3 blades]

Delta3.description: Delta-3 angle for teetering rotors (degrees) [unused for 3 blades]

AzimB1Up.description: Azimuth value to use for I/O when blade 1 points up (radians)

ShftGagL.description: Distance from rotor apex [3 blades] or teeter pin [2 blades] to shaft strain gages [positive for upwind rotors] (meters)

NcIMUxn.description: Downwind distance from the tower-top to the nacelle IMU (meters)

NcIMUyn.description: Lateral distance from the tower-top to the nacelle IMU (meters)

NcIMUzn.description: Vertical distance from the tower-top to the nacelle IMU (meters)

BldNodes.description: Number of blade nodes (per blade) used for analysis (-)

TeetMod.description: Rotor-teeter spring/damper model {0: none, 1: standard, 2: user-defined from routine UserTeet} (switch) [unused for 3 blades]

TeetDmpP.description: Rotor-teeter damper position (radians) [used only for 2 blades and when TeetMod=1]

TeetDmp.description: Rotor-teeter damping constant (N-m/(rad/s)) [used only for 2 blades and when TeetMod=1]

TeetCDmp.description: Rotor-teeter rate-independent Coulomb-damping moment (N-m) [used only for 2 blades and when TeetMod=1]

TeetSStP.description: Rotor-teeter soft-stop position (radians) [used only for 2 blades and when TeetMod=1]

TeetHStP.description: Rotor-teeter hard-stop position (radians) [used only for 2 blades and when TeetMod=1]

TeetSSSp.description: Rotor-teeter soft-stop linear-spring constant (N-m/rad) [used only for 2 blades and when TeetMod=1]

TeetHSSp.description: Rotor-teeter hard-stop linear-spring constant (N-m/rad) [used only for 2 blades and when TeetMod=1]

Furling.description: Read in additional model properties for furling turbine (flag) [must currently be FALSE)

FurlFile.description: Name of file containing furling properties (quoted string) [unused when Furling=False]

TwrNodes.description: Number of tower nodes used for analysis (-)

OutFile.description: Switch to determine where output will be placed 1 in module output file only; 2 in glue code output file only; 3 both (currently unused)

TabDelim.description: Use tab delimiters in text tabular output file? (flag) (currently unused)

OutFmt.description: Format used for text tabular output (except time).  Resulting field should be 10 characters. (quoted string (currently unused)

DecFact.description: Decimation factor for tabular output 1 output every time step} (-) (currently unused)

TStart.description: Time to begin tabular output (s) (currently unused)

BldFlDmp1.description: Blade flap mode 1 structural damping in percent of critical (%)

BldFlDmp2.description: Blade flap mode 2 structural damping in percent of critical (%)

BldEdDmp1.description: Blade edge mode 1 structural damping in percent of critical (%)

FlStTunr1.description: Blade flapwise modal stiffness tuner, 1st mode (-)

FlStTunr2.description: Blade flapwise modal stiffness tuner, 2nd mode (-)

AdjBlMs.description: Factor to adjust blade mass density (-)

AdjFlSt.description: Factor to adjust blade flap stiffness (-)

AdjEdSt.description: Factor to adjust blade edge stiffness (-)

TwrFADmp1.description: Tower 1st fore-aft mode structural damping ratio (%)

TwrFADmp2.description: Tower 2nd fore-aft mode structural damping ratio (%)

TwrSSDmp1.description: Tower 1st side-to-side mode structural damping ratio (%)

TwrSSDmp2.description: Tower 2nd side-to-side mode structural damping ratio (%)

FlStTunr1.description: Blade flapwise modal stiffness tuner, 1st mode (-)

FAStTunr1.description: Tower fore-aft modal stiffness tuner, 1st mode (-)

FAStTunr2.description: Tower fore-aft modal stiffness tuner, 2nd mode (-)

AdjTwMa.description: Factor to adjust tower mass density (-)

AdjFASt.description: Factor to adjust tower fore-aft stiffness (-)

AdjSSSt.description: Factor to adjust tower side-to-side stiffness (-)

QuasiStaticInit.description: Use quasistatic pre-conditioning with centripetal accelerations in initialization (flag) [dynamic solve only]

rhoinf.description: Numerical damping parameter for generalized-alpha integrator

refine.description: Refinement factor for trapezoidal quadrature (-). DEFAULT = 1 [used only when quadrature=2]

DTBeam.description: Time step size (s). Use 0.0 for Default

load_retries.description: Number of factored load retries before quitting the simulation. Use 0 for Default

NRMax.description: Max number of iterations in Newton-Ralphson algorithm (-). DEFAULT = 10

tngt_stf_fd.description: Flag to use finite differenced tangent stiffness matrix (-)

tngt_stf_comp.description: Flag to compare analytical finite differenced tangent stiffness matrix  (-)

tngt_stf_pert.description: perturbation size for finite differencing (-).  Use 0.0 for DEFAULT

tngt_stf_difftol.description: Maximum allowable relative difference between analytical and fd tangent stiffness (-)

RotStates.description: Orient states in the rotating frame during linearization? (flag) [used only when linearizing]

UsePitchAct.description: Whether a pitch actuator should be used (flag)

PitchJ.description: Pitch actuator inertia (kg-m^2) [used only when UsePitchAct is true]

PitchK.description: Pitch actuator stiffness (kg-m^2/s^2) [used only when UsePitchAct is true]

PitchC.description: Pitch actuator damping (kg-m^2/s) [used only when UsePitchAct is true]

WaveMod.description: Incident wave kinematics model {0- none/still water, 1- regular (periodic), 1P#- regular with user-specified phase, 2- JONSWAP/Pierson-Moskowitz spectrum (irregular), 3- White noise spectrum (irregular), 4- user-defined spectrum from routine UserWaveSpctrm (irregular), 5- Externally generated wave-elevation time series, 6- Externally generated full wave-kinematics time series [option 6 is invalid for PotMod/=0]} (switch)

WaveStMod.description: Model for stretching incident wave kinematics to instantaneous free surface {0 = none=no stretching, 1 = vertical stretching, 2 = extrapolation stretching, 3 = Wheeler stretching} (switch) [unused when WaveMod=0 or when PotMod/=0]

WaveTMax.description: Analysis time for incident wave calculations (sec) [unused when WaveMod=0; determines WaveDOmega=2Pi/WaveTMax in the IFFT]

WaveDT.description: Time step for incident wave calculations     (sec) [unused when WaveMod=0; 0.1<=WaveDT<=1.0 recommended; determines WaveOmegaMax=Pi/WaveDT in the IFFT]

WavePkShp.description: Peak-shape parameter of incident wave spectrum (-) or DEFAULT (string) [used only when WaveMod=2; use 1.0 for Pierson-Moskowitz]

WvLowCOff.description: Low cut-off frequency or lower frequency limit of the wave spectrum beyond which the wave spectrum is zeroed (rad/s) [unused when WaveMod=0, 1, or 6]

WvHiCOff.description: High cut-off frequency or upper frequency limit of the wave spectrum beyond which the wave spectrum is zeroed (rad/s) [unused when WaveMod=0, 1, or 6]

WaveDir.description: Incident wave propagation heading direction [unused when WaveMod=0 or 6]

WaveDirMod.description: Directional spreading function {0 = none, 1 = COS2S} [only used when WaveMod=2,3, or 4]

WaveDirSpread.description: Wave direction spreading coefficient ( > 0 ) [only used when WaveMod=2,3, or 4 and WaveDirMod=1]

WaveNDir.description: Number of wave directions [only used when WaveMod=2,3, or 4 and WaveDirMod=1; odd number only]

WaveDirRange.description: Range of wave directions (full range = WaveDir +/- 1/2*WaveDirRange) (degrees) [only used when WaveMod=2,3,or 4 and WaveDirMod=1]

WaveSeed1.description: First random seed of incident waves [-2147483648 to 2147483647] [unused when WaveMod=0, 5, or 6]

WaveSeed2.description: Second random seed of incident waves [-2147483648 to 2147483647] [unused when WaveMod=0, 5, or 6]. Use RANLUX for internal FAST pseudo-random number generator

WaveNDAmp.description: Flag for normally distributed amplitudes [only used when WaveMod=2, 3, or 4]

WvKinFile.description: Root name of externally generated wave data file(s) (quoted string) [used only when WaveMod=5 or 6]

NWaveElev.description: Number of points where the incident wave elevations can be computed (-) [maximum of 9 output locations]

WaveElevxi.description: List of xi-coordinates for points where the incident wave elevations can be output (meters) [NWaveElev points, separated by commas or white space; usused if NWaveElev = 0]

WaveElevyi.description: List of yi-coordinates for points where the incident wave elevations can be output (meters) [NWaveElev points, separated by commas or white space; usused if NWaveElev = 0]

WvLowCOffD.description: Low frequency cutoff used in the difference-frequencies (rad/s) [Only used with a difference-frequency method]

WvHiCOffD.description: High frequency cutoff used in the difference-frequencies (rad/s) [Only used with a difference-frequency method]

WvLowCOffS.description: Low frequency cutoff used in the summation-frequencies  (rad/s) [Only used with a summation-frequency method]

WvHiCOffS.description: High frequency cutoff used in the summation-frequencies  (rad/s) [Only used with a summation-frequency method]

CurrMod.description: Current profile model {0 = none=no current, 1 = standard, 2 = user-defined from routine UserCurrent} (switch)

CurrSSV0.description: Sub-surface current velocity at still water level  (m/s) [used only when CurrMod=1]

CurrSSDir.description: Sub-surface current heading direction (radians) or 0.0 for default [used only when CurrMod=1]

CurrNSRef.description: Near-surface current reference depth (meters) [used only when CurrMod=1]

CurrNSV0.description: Near-surface current velocity at still water level (m/s) [used only when CurrMod=1]

CurrNSDir.description: Near-surface current heading direction (degrees) [used only when CurrMod=1]

CurrDIV.description: Depth-independent current velocity (m/s) [used only when CurrMod=1]

CurrDIDir.description: Depth-independent current heading direction (radians) [used only when CurrMod=1]

PotMod.description: Potential-flow model {0 = none=no potential flow, 1 = frequency-to-time-domain transforms based on Capytaine/NEMOH/WAMIT output, 2 = fluid-impulse theory (FIT)} (switch)

PotFile.description: Will be automatically filled in with HAMS output unless a value here overrides it; WAMIT output files containing the linear, nondimensionalized, hydrostatic restoring matrix (.hst), frequency-dependent hydrodynamic added mass matrix and damping matrix (.1), and frequency- and direction-dependent wave excitation force vector per unit wave amplitude (.3) (quoted string) [MAKE SURE THE FREQUENCIES INHERENT IN THESE WAMIT FILES SPAN THE PHYSICALLY-SIGNIFICANT RANGE OF FREQUENCIES FOR THE GIVEN PLATFORM; THEY MUST CONTAIN THE ZERO- AND INFINITE-FREQUENCY LIMITS]

WAMITULEN.description: Characteristic body length scale used to redimensionalize Capytaine/NEMOH/WAMIT output (meters) [only used when PotMod=1]

PtfmMass_Init.description: Mass of initial platform design. When PtfmMass_Init > 0, PtfmVol0 will scale with the platform mass; this is a temporary solution to enable spar simulations where the heave is very sensitive to platform mass.

PtfmCOBxt.description: The xt offset of the center of buoyancy (COB) from the platform reference point (meters) [only used when PotMod=1]

PtfmCOByt.description: The yt offset of the center of buoyancy (COB) from the platform reference point (meters) [only used when PotMod=1]

ExctnMod.description: Wave Excitation model {0 = None, 1 = DFT, 2 = state-space} (switch) [only used when PotMod=1; STATE-SPACE REQUIRES *.ssexctn INPUT FILE]

RdtnMod.description: Radiation memory-effect model {0 = no memory-effect calculation, 1 = convolution, 2 = state-space} (switch) [only used when PotMod=1; STATE-SPACE REQUIRES *.ss INPUT FILE]

RdtnTMax.description: Analysis time for wave radiation kernel calculations (sec) [only used when PotMod=1; determines RdtnDOmega=Pi/RdtnTMax in the cosine transform; MAKE SURE THIS IS LONG ENOUGH FOR THE RADIATION IMPULSE RESPONSE FUNCTIONS TO DECAY TO NEAR-ZERO FOR THE GIVEN PLATFORM!]

RdtnDT.description: Time step for wave radiation kernel calculations, use 0.0 for default (sec) [only used when PotMod=1; DT<=RdtnDT<=0.1 recommended; determines RdtnOmegaMax=Pi/RdtnDT in the cosine transform]

MnDrift.description: Mean-drift 2nd-order forces computed {0 = None; [7, 8, 9, 10, 11, or 12] = WAMIT file to use} [Only one of MnDrift, NewmanApp, or DiffQTF can be non-zero]

NewmanApp.description: Mean- and slow-drift 2nd-order forces computed with Newman's approximation {0 = None; [7, 8, 9, 10, 11, or 12] = WAMIT file to use} [Only one of MnDrift, NewmanApp, or DiffQTF can be non-zero. Used only when WaveDirMod=0]

DiffQTF.description: Full difference-frequency 2nd-order forces computed with full QTF {0 = None; [10, 11, or 12] = WAMIT file to use} [Only one of MnDrift, NewmanApp, or DiffQTF can be non-zero]

SumQTF.description: Full summation -frequency 2nd-order forces computed with full QTF {0 = None; [10, 11, or 12] = WAMIT file to use}

AddCLin1.description: Additional linear stiffness by row (N/m, N/rad, N-m/m, N-m/rad)

AddCLin2.description: Additional linear stiffness by row (N/m, N/rad, N-m/m, N-m/rad)

AddCLin3.description: Additional linear stiffness by row (N/m, N/rad, N-m/m, N-m/rad)

AddCLin4.description: Additional linear stiffness by row (N/m, N/rad, N-m/m, N-m/rad)

AddCLin5.description: Additional linear stiffness by row (N/m, N/rad, N-m/m, N-m/rad)

AddCLin6.description: Additional linear stiffness by row (N/m, N/rad, N-m/m, N-m/rad)

AddBLin1.description: Additional linear damping by row (N/(m/s), N/(rad/s), N-m/(m/s), N-m/(rad/s))

AddBLin2.description: Additional linear damping by row (N/(m/s), N/(rad/s), N-m/(m/s), N-m/(rad/s))

AddBLin3.description: Additional linear damping by row (N/(m/s), N/(rad/s), N-m/(m/s), N-m/(rad/s))

AddBLin4.description: Additional linear damping by row (N/(m/s), N/(rad/s), N-m/(m/s), N-m/(rad/s))

AddBLin5.description: Additional linear damping by row (N/(m/s), N/(rad/s), N-m/(m/s), N-m/(rad/s))

AddBLin6.description: Additional linear damping by row (N/(m/s), N/(rad/s), N-m/(m/s), N-m/(rad/s))

AddBQuad1.description: Additional quadratic drag by row (N/(m/s)^2, N/(rad/s)^2, N-m(m/s)^2, N-m/(rad/s)^2)

AddBQuad2.description: Additional quadratic drag by row (N/(m/s)^2, N/(rad/s)^2, N-m(m/s)^2, N-m/(rad/s)^2)

AddBQuad3.description: Additional quadratic drag by row (N/(m/s)^2, N/(rad/s)^2, N-m(m/s)^2, N-m/(rad/s)^2)

AddBQuad4.description: Additional quadratic drag by row (N/(m/s)^2, N/(rad/s)^2, N-m(m/s)^2, N-m/(rad/s)^2)

AddBQuad5.description: Additional quadratic drag by row (N/(m/s)^2, N/(rad/s)^2, N-m(m/s)^2, N-m/(rad/s)^2)

AddBQuad6.description: Additional quadratic drag by row (N/(m/s)^2, N/(rad/s)^2, N-m(m/s)^2, N-m/(rad/s)^2)

JOutLst.description: List of JointIDs which are to be output (-)[unused if NJOutputs=0]

OutAll.description: Output all user-specified member and joint loads (only at each member end, not interior locations) [flag]

OutFmt.description: Output format for numerical results (quoted string) [not checked for validity]

OutSFmt.description: Output format for header strings (quoted string) [not checked for validity]

NBody.description: Number of WAMIT bodies to be used (-) [>=1; only used when PotMod=1. If NBodyMod=1, the WAMIT data contains a vector of size 6*NBody x 1 and matrices of size 6*NBody x 6*NBody; if NBodyMod>1, there are NBody sets of WAMIT data each with a vector of size 6 x 1 and matrices of size 6 x 6]

NBodyMod.description: Body coupling model {1- include coupling terms between each body and NBody in HydroDyn equals NBODY in WAMIT, 2- neglect coupling terms between each body and NBODY=1 with XBODY=0 in WAMIT, 3- Neglect coupling terms between each body and NBODY=1 with XBODY=/0 in WAMIT} (switch) [only used when PotMod=1]

SimplCd.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplCa.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplCp.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplCdMG.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplCaMG.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplCpMG.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplAxCd.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 0.0

SimplAxCa.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplAxCp.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplAxCdMG.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 0.0

SimplAxCaMG.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SimplAxCpMG.description: Simple strip theory model coefficient, default of 1.0

SDdeltaT.description: Local Integration Step. If 0.0, the glue-code integration step will be used.

SttcSolve.description: Solve dynamics about static equilibrium point

GuyanLoadCorrection.description: Include extra moment from lever arm at interface and rotate FEM for floating.

FEMMod.description: FEM switch = element model in the FEM. [1= Euler-Bernoulli(E-B);  2=Tapered E-B (unavailable);  3= 2-node Timoshenko;  4= 2-node tapered Timoshenko (unavailable)]

CBMod.description: If True perform C-B reduction, else full FEM dofs will be retained. If True, select Nmodes to retain in C-B reduced system.

Nmodes.description: Number of internal modes to retain (ignored if CBMod=False). If Nmodes=0 --> Guyan Reduction.

JDampings.description: Damping Ratios for each retained mode (% of critical) If Nmodes>0, list Nmodes structural damping ratios for each retained mode (% of critical), or a single damping ratio to be applied to all retained modes. (last entered value will be used for all remaining modes).

RayleighDamp.description: Mass and stiffness proportional damping  coefficients (Rayleigh Damping) [only if GuyanDampMod=1]

SumPrint.description: Output a Summary File (flag) that contains matrices K,M  and C-B reduced M_BB, M-BM, K_BB, K_MM(OMG^2), PHI_R, PHI_L. It can also contain COSMs if requested.

OutCBModes.description: Output Guyan and Craig-Bampton modes {0 No output, 1 JSON output}, (flag)

OutFEMModes.description: Output first 30 FEM modes {0 No output, 1 JSON output} (flag)

OutCOSM.description: Output cosine matrices with the selected output member forces (flag)

OutSwtch.description: Output requested channels to 1=<rootname>.SD.out;  2=<rootname>.out (generated by FAST);  3=both files.

TabDelim.description: Generate a tab-delimited output in the <rootname>.SD.out file

OutDec.description: Decimation of output in the <rootname>.SD.out file

OutFmt.description: Output format for numerical results in the <rootname>.SD.out file (quoted string) [not checked for validity]

OutSFmt.description: Output format for header strings in the <rootname>.SD.out file (quoted string) [not checked for validity]

NMOutputs.description: Number of members whose forces/displacements/velocities/accelerations will be output (-) [Must be <= 9].

dtM.description: Time step to use in mooring integration (s)

dtIC.description: Time interval for analyzing convergence during IC gen (s)

CdScaleIC.description: Factor by which to scale drag coefficients during dynamic relaxation (-)

PCMode.description: Pitch control mode {0 = none, 4 = user-defined from Simulink/Labview, 5 = user-defined from Bladed-style DLL}

TPCOn.description: Time to enable active pitch control (s) [unused when PCMode=0]

TPitManS1.description: Time to start override pitch maneuver for blade 1 and end standard pitch control (s)

TPitManS2.description: Time to start override pitch maneuver for blade 2 and end standard pitch control (s)

TPitManS3.description: Time to start override pitch maneuver for blade 3 and end standard pitch control (s)

PitManRat(1).description: Pitch rate at which override pitch maneuver heads toward final pitch angle for blade 1 (deg/s). It cannot be 0

PitManRat(2).description: Pitch rate at which override pitch maneuver heads toward final pitch angle for blade 2 (deg/s). It cannot be 0

PitManRat(3).description: Pitch rate at which override pitch maneuver heads toward final pitch angle for blade 3 (deg/s). It cannot be 0

BlPitchF(1).description: Blade 1 final pitch for pitch maneuvers (degrees)

BlPitchF(2).description: Blade 2 final pitch for pitch maneuvers (degrees)

BlPitchF(3).description: Blade 3 final pitch for pitch maneuvers (degrees)

VSContrl.description: Variable-speed control mode {0 = none, 4 = user-defined from Simulink/Labview, 5 = user-defined from Bladed-style DLL}

GenModel.description: Generator model {1 = simple, 2 = Thevenin, 3 = user-defined from routine UserGen}

GenTiStr.description: Method to start the generator {True - timed using TimGenOn, False - generator speed using SpdGenOn} (flag)

GenTiStp.description: Method to stop the generator {True - timed using TimGenOf, False - when generator power = 0} (flag)

SpdGenOn.description: Generator speed to turn on the generator for a startup (HSS speed) (rpm) [used only when GenTiStr=False]

TimGenOn.description: Time to turn on the generator for a startup (s) [used only when GenTiStr=True]

TimGenOf.description: Time to turn off the generator (s) [used only when GenTiStp=True]

VS_RtGnSp.description: Rated generator speed for simple variable-speed generator control (HSS side) (rpm) [used only when VSContrl=1]

VS_RtTq.description: Rated generator torque/constant generator torque in Region 3 for simple variable-speed generator control (HSS side) (N-m) [used only when VSContrl=1]

VS_Rgn2K.description: Generator torque constant in Region 2 for simple variable-speed generator control (HSS side) (N-m/rpm^2) [used only when VSContrl=1]

VS_SlPc.description: Rated generator slip percentage in Region 2 1/2 for simple variable-speed generator control (%) [used only when VSContrl=1]

SIG_SlPc.description: Rated generator slip percentage (%) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=1]

SIG_SySp.description: Synchronous (zero-torque) generator speed (rpm) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=1]

SIG_RtTq.description: Rated torque (N-m) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=1]

SIG_PORt.description: Pull-out ratio (Tpullout/Trated) (-) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=1]

TEC_Freq.description: Line frequency [50 or 60] (Hz) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=2]

TEC_NPol.description: Number of poles [even integer > 0] (-) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=2]

TEC_SRes.description: Stator resistance (ohms) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=2]

TEC_RRes.description: Rotor resistance (ohms) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=2]

TEC_VLL.description: Line-to-line RMS voltage (volts) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=2]

TEC_SLR.description: Stator leakage reactance (ohms) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=2]

TEC_RLR.description: Rotor leakage reactance (ohms) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=2]

TEC_MR.description: Magnetizing reactance (ohms) [used only when VSContrl=0 and GenModel=2]

HSSBrMode.description: HSS brake model {0 = none, 1 = simple, 4 = user-defined from Simulink/Labview, 5 = user-defined from Bladed-style DLL (not in ROSCO, yet)}

THSSBrDp.description: Time to initiate deployment of the HSS brake (s)

HSSBrDT.description: Time for HSS-brake to reach full deployment once initiated (sec) [used only when HSSBrMode=1]

YCMode.description: Yaw control mode {0 - none, 3 - user-defined from routine UserYawCont, 4 - user-defined from Simulink/Labview, 5 - user-defined from Bladed-style DLL} (switch)

TYCOn.description: Time to enable active yaw control (s) [unused when YCMode=0]

YawNeut.description: Neutral yaw position--yaw spring force is zero at this yaw (degrees)

TYawManS.description: Time to start override yaw maneuver and end standard yaw control (s)

YawManRat.description: Yaw maneuver rate (in absolute value) (deg/s). It cannot be zero

NacYawF.description: Final yaw angle for override yaw maneuvers (degrees)

AfCmode.description: Airfoil control mode {0- none, 1- cosine wave cycle, 4- user-defined from Simulink/Labview, 5- user-defined from Bladed-style DLL}

AfC_Mean.description: Mean level for sinusoidal cycling or steady value (-) [used only with AfCmode==1]

AfC_Amp.description: Amplitude for for cosine cycling of flap signal (AfC = AfC_Amp*cos(Azimuth+phase)+AfC_mean) (-) [used only with AfCmode==1]

AfC_Phase.description: AfC_phase - Phase relative to the blade azimuth (0 is vertical) for for cosine cycling of flap signal (deg) [used only with AfCmode==1]

CCmode.description: Cable control mode {0- none, 4- user-defined from Simulink/Labview, 5- user-defineAfC_phased from Bladed-style DLL}

NTMDfile.description: Name of the file for nacelle tuned mass damper (quoted string) [unused when CompNTMD is false]

TTMDfile.description: Name of the file for tower tuned mass damper (quoted string) [unused when CompTTMD is false]

DLL_ProcName.description: Name of procedure in DLL to be called (-) [case sensitive; used only with DLL Interface]

DLL_DT.description: Communication interval for dynamic library (s) (or 'default') [used only with Bladed Interface]

DLL_Ramp.description: Whether a linear ramp should be used between DLL_DT time steps [introduces time shift when true] (flag) [used only with Bladed Interface]

BPCutoff.description: Cuttoff frequency for low-pass filter on blade pitch from DLL (Hz) [used only with Bladed Interface]

NacYaw_North.description: Reference yaw angle of the nacelle when the upwind end points due North (deg) [used only with Bladed Interface]

Ptch_Cntrl.description: Record 28 Use individual pitch control {0 - collective pitch; 1 - individual pitch control} (switch) [used only with Bladed Interface]

Ptch_SetPnt.description: Record  5 Below-rated pitch angle set-point (deg) [used only with Bladed Interface]

Ptch_Min.description: Record  6 - Minimum pitch angle (deg) [used only with Bladed Interface]

Ptch_Max.description: Record  7 Maximum pitch angle (deg) [used only with Bladed Interface]

PtchRate_Min.description: Record  8 Minimum pitch rate (most negative value allowed) (deg/s) [used only with Bladed Interface]

PtchRate_Max.description: Record  9 Maximum pitch rate  (deg/s) [used only with Bladed Interface]

Gain_OM.description: Record 16 Optimal mode gain (Nm/(rad/s)^2) [used only with Bladed Interface]

GenSpd_MinOM.description: Record 17 Minimum generator speed (rpm) [used only with Bladed Interface]

GenSpd_MaxOM.description: Record 18 Optimal mode maximum speed (rpm) [used only with Bladed Interface]

GenSpd_Dem.description: Record 19 Demanded generator speed above rated (rpm) [used only with Bladed Interface]

GenTrq_Dem.description: Record 22 Demanded generator torque above rated (Nm) [used only with Bladed Interface]

GenPwr_Dem.description: Record 13 Demanded power (W) [used only with Bladed Interface]

DLL_NumTrq.description: Record 26 No. of points in torque-speed look-up table {0 = none and use the optimal mode parameters; nonzero = ignore the optimal mode PARAMETERs by setting Record 16 to 0.0} (-) [used only with Bladed Interface]

OutFile.description: Switch to determine where output will be placed 1 in module output file only; 2 in glue code output file only; 3 both (currently unused)

TabDelim.description: Use tab delimiters in text tabular output file? (flag) (currently unused)

OutFmt.description: Format used for text tabular output (except time).  Resulting field should be 10 characters. (quoted string (currently unused)

TStart.description: Time to begin tabular output (s) (currently unused)

from_openfast.description: Whether we derive OpenFAST model from an existing model and ignore WISDEM

regulation_trajectory.description: Only used if from_openfast is set to True. Path to yaml file containing output data of the turbine tabulated against wind speed (rotor speed, blade pitch angle, aero thrust coefficient) needed to initialize the OpenFAST model through

openfast_file.description: Main (.fst) OpenFAST input file name. No directory.

openfast_dir.description: OpenFAST input directory, containing .fst file.  Absolute path or relative to modeling input

run_parallel.description: Whether or not to run xfoil in parallel (requires mpi setup)

OpenFAST_Linear.description: Options for WEIS fidelity level 2 = linearized time domain (OpenFAST)

flag.description: Whether or not to run WEIS fidelity level 2 = linearized OpenFAST
Whether or not to run a level 2 time domain simulation

wind_speeds.description: List of wind speeds at which to linearize (m/s)

rated_offset.description: Amount to increase rated wind speed from cc-blade to openfast with DOFs enabled.  In general, the more DOFs, the greater this value.

DOFs.description: List of degrees-of-freedom to linearize about

TrimTol.description: Tolerance for the rotational speed convergence [used only if CalcSteady=True] (-)

TrimGain.description: Proportional gain for the rotational speed error (>0) [used only if CalcSteady=True] (rad/(rad/s) for yaw or pitch; Nm/(rad/s) for torque)

Twr_Kdmp.description: Damping factor for the tower [used only if CalcSteady=True] (N/(m/s))

Bld_Kdmp.description: Damping factor for the blades [used only if CalcSteady=True] (N/(m/s))

NLinTimes.description: Number of times to linearize (-) [>=1] [unused if Linearize=False]

LinTimes.description: List of times at which to linearize (s) [1 to NLinTimes] [used only when Linearize=True and CalcSteady=False]

flag.description: Whether or not to run a DTQP optimization at level 2

nt.description: Number of timesteps in DTQP timeseries optimization

maxiters.description: Maximum number of DTQP optimization iterations

DLC.description: IEC design load case to run. The DLCs currently supported are 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6, 5.1, 6.1, 6.3, and 6.4

wind_speed.description: Wind speeds for this DLC. If these are defined, ws_bin_size is neglected.

ws_bin_size.description: Size of the wind speed bin between cut in and cout out wind speeds. It usually can be set to 2 m/s. This entry is neglected if the wind speeds are specified by the user.

n_seeds.description: Number of turbulent wind seeds drawn from the numpy random integer generator. This entry is neglected if the entry wind_seed is defined.  If DLC 1.4, number of waves seeds.

n_azimuth.description: Number of azimuth initial conditions to use (primarily during DLC 5.1)

wind_seed.description: Array of turbulent wind seeds for TurbSim. If these are defined, n_seeds is neglected.

wave_seeds.description: Wave random number generator seeds for HydroDyn

wind_heading.description: Wind direction from north. This array must currently have either length=1, i.e. one constant value, or the same length of the array wind_speed.

yaw_misalign.description: Alignment of the nacelle with respect to north. This array must currently have either length=1, i.e. one constant value, or the same length of the array wind_speed. Default depends on DLC, specified in dlc_generator.

wave_spectrum.description: Spectrum of the waves. This array must currently have either length=1, i.e. one constant spectrum, or the same length of the array wind_speed

turbine_status.description: Status of the turbine, it can be either operating, parked-idling, or parked-still. Each DLC come with its default turbine status specified by the standards.

wave_period.description: Period between waves. If this array is populated by the user, then the field metocean_conditions is neglected. If wave_period is not defined, metocean_conditions will be used, either in the values provided by the user or with its default values (the first option is highly recommended).

wave_height.description: Height of the waves. If this array is populated by the user, then the field metocean_conditions is neglected. If wave_height is not defined, metocean_conditions will be used, either in the values provided by the user or with its default values (the first option is highly recommended).

wave_heading.description: Heading of the waves with respect to north. This array must currently have either length=1, i.e. one constant value, or the same length of the array wind_speed

wave_gamma.description: Peak-shape parameter of incident wave spectrum. If 0, the default from IEC61400-3 / HydroDyn is used. This array must currently have either length=1, i.e. one constant value, or the same length of the array wind_speed

probabilities.description: Probability of occurrance for each case. This entry is relevant only for DLC 1.2 and 6.4. This array must currently have either length=1, i.e. one constant value, or the same length of the array wind_speed.

IEC_WindType.description: IEC turbulence type ('NTM'=normal, 'xETM'=extreme turbulence, 'xEWM1'=extreme 1-year wind, 'xEWM50'=extreme 50-year wind, where x=wind turbine class 1, 2, or 3), 'ECD'=extreme coherent gust with direction change, 'EDC'=extreme direction change, 'EOG'=extreme operating gust. Normally the user does not need to define this entry.

analysis_time.description: This is the length of the simulation where outputs will be recorded. Its default is 600 seconds (10 minutes) for most simulations, except for the coherent cases where a shorter time window of 200 s is used.

transient_time.description: This is the length of the simulation where outputs will be discarded. Its default is 120 seconds (2 minutes) for all simulations. The total simulation time is the sum of analysis_time and transient_time

shutdown_time.description: Time when shutdown occurs in DLC 5.1

wind_file.description: File path of custom wind file

turbulent_wind.description: These are all inputs to TurbSim. These inputs usually do not need to be set unless you are trying to customize a DLC

flag.description: Flag switching between steady wind and turbulent wind grid from TurbSim.

WrBHHTP.description: Output hub-height turbulence parameters in binary form?  (Generates RootName.bin)

WrFHHTP.description: Output hub-height turbulence parameters in formatted form?  (Generates RootName.dat)

WrADHH.description: Output hub-height time-series data in AeroDyn form?  (Generates RootName.hh)

WrADFF.description: Output full-field time-series data in TurbSim/AeroDyn form? (Generates RootName.bts)

WrBLFF.description: Output full-field time-series data in BLADED/AeroDyn form?  (Generates RootName.wnd)

WrFMTFF.description: Output full-field time-series data in formatted (readable) form?  (Generates RootName.u, RootName.v, RootName.w)

WrACT.description: Output coherent turbulence time steps in AeroDyn form? (Generates RootName.cts)

Clockwise.description: Clockwise rotation looking downwind? (used only for full-field binary files - not necessary for AeroDyn)

ScaleIEC.description: Scale IEC turbulence models to exact target standard deviation? [0=no additional scaling; 1=use hub scale uniformly; 2=use individual scales]

UsableTime.description: Usable length of output time series [seconds] (program will add GridWidth/MeanHHWS seconds unless UsableTime is 'ALL')

UserFile.description: Name of the file that contains inputs for user-defined spectra or time series inputs (used only for "USRINP" and "TIMESR" models)

IECstandard.description: Number of IEC 61400-x standard (x=1,2, or 3 with optional 61400-1 edition number (i.e. "1-Ed2") )

WindProfileType.description: Velocity profile type ('LOG';'PL'=power law;'JET';'H2L'=Log law for TIDAL model;'API';'USR';'TS';'IEC'=PL on rotor disk, LOG elsewhere; or 'default')

ProfileFile.description: Name of the file that contains input profiles for WindProfileType='USR' and/or TurbModel='USRVKM' [-]

URef.description: Mean (total) velocity at the reference height [m/s] (or 'default' for JET velocity profile) [must be 1-hr mean for API model; otherwise is the mean over AnalysisTime seconds]

IECturbc.description: Turbulence intensity (fraction) for custom DLCs, if default (-1), the class letter will be used

ZJetMax.description: Jet height [m] (used only for JET velocity profile, valid 70-490 m)

PLExp.description: Power law exponent [-] (or 'default'), if default (-1), the environment option shear_exp will be used for all DLCs

PC_UW.description: Hub mean uw Reynolds stress [m^2/s^2] (or 'default' or 'none')

PC_UV.description: Hub mean uv Reynolds stress [m^2/s^2] (or 'default' or 'none')

PC_VW.description: Hub mean vw Reynolds stress [m^2/s^2] (or 'default' or 'none')

InCDec1.description: u-component coherence parameters for general or IEC models [-, m^-1] (e.g. '10.0  0.3e-3' in quotes) (or 'default')

InCDec2.description: v-component coherence parameters for general or IEC models [-, m^-1] (e.g. '10.0  0.3e-3' in quotes) (or 'default')

InCDec3.description: w-component coherence parameters for general or IEC models [-, m^-1] (e.g. '10.0  0.3e-3' in quotes) (or 'default')

CTEventPath.description: Name of the path where event data files are located

Randomize.description: Randomize the disturbance scale and locations? (true/false)

DistScl.description: Disturbance scale [-] (ratio of event dataset height to rotor disk). (Ignored when Randomize = true.)

CTLy.description: Fractional location of tower centerline from right [-] (looking downwind) to left side of the dataset. (Ignored when Randomize = true.)

CTLz.description: Fractional location of hub height from the bottom of the dataset. [-] (Ignored when Randomize = true.)

CTStartTime.description: Minimum start time for coherent structures in RootName.cts

fix_wind_seeds.description: Fix the seed of the random integer generator controlling the seed of TurbSim. When set to False, the seeds change everytime the DLC generator class is called. It is recommended to keep it to True when the optimization is on, or different wind seeds will be generated for every function call, complicating the smoothness of the solution space. Even when set to True, the wind seeds are different across wind speeds and DLCs.

fix_wave_seeds.description: Fix the seed of the random integer generator controlling the wave seed of HydroDyn. When set to False, the seeds change everytime the DLC generator class is called. It is recommended to keep it to True when the optimization is on, or different wave seeds will be generated for every function call, complicating the smoothness of the solution space. Even when set to True, the wave seeds are different across wind speeds and DLCs.

metocean_conditions.description: Here the metocean conditions can be specified in terms of wind speeds, significant wave height (Hs), and wave period (Tp) for normal sea state (NSS), fatigue calculations, and severe sea state (SSS). Currently WEIS neglects the joint probability density function crossing wind/wave directionality, wave peak shape parameter gamma

wind_speed.description: Array of wind speeds to tabulate Hs and Tp

wave_height_NSS.description: Array of Hs for NSS conditional to wind speed

wave_period_NSS.description: Array of Tp for NSS conditional to wind speed

wave_height_fatigue.description: Array of Hs for fatigue computations conditional to wind speed

wave_period_fatigue.description: Array of Tp for fatigue computations conditional to wind speed

wave_height_SSS.description: Array of Hs for SSS conditional to wind speed

wave_period_SSS.description: Array of Tp for SSS conditional to wind speed

wave_height50.description: Wave height with 50-year occurrence, used in DLC 6.1

wave_period50.description: Wave period with 50-year occurrence, used in DLC 6.1

wave_height1.description: Wave height with 1-year occurrence, used in DLC 6.3, 7.1, and 8.2

wave_period1.description: Wave period with 1-year occurrence, used in DLC 6.3, 7.1, and 8.2

ROSCO.description: Options for WEIS fidelity level 3 = nonlinear time domain. Inherited from ROSCO/rosco/toolbox/inputs/toolbox_shema.yaml

LoggingLevel.description: 0- write no debug files, 1- write standard output .dbg-file, 2- write standard output .dbg-file and complete avrSWAP-array .dbg2-file

F_LPFType.description: 1- first-order low-pass filter, 2- second-order low-pass filter, [rad/s] (currently filters generator speed and pitch control signals)

F_NotchType.description: Notch on the measured generator speed and/or tower fore-aft motion (for floating) {0- disable, 1- generator speed, 2- tower-top fore-aft motion, 3- generator speed and tower-top fore-aft motion}

IPC_ControlMode.description: Turn Individual Pitch Control (IPC) for fatigue load reductions (pitch contribution) (0- off, 1- 1P reductions, 2- 1P+2P reduction)

VS_ControlMode.description: Generator torque control mode in above rated conditions (0- no torque control, 1- k*omega^2 with PI transitions, 2- WSE TSR Tracking, 3- Power-based TSR Tracking)

VS_ConstPower.description: Do constant power torque control, where above rated torque varies, 0 for constant torque

PC_ControlMode.description: Blade pitch control mode (0- No pitch, fix to fine pitch, 1- active PI blade pitch control)

Y_ControlMode.description: Yaw control mode (0- no yaw control, 1- yaw rate control, 2- yaw-by-IPC)

SS_Mode.description: Setpoint Smoother mode (0- no setpoint smoothing, 1- introduce setpoint smoothing)

WE_Mode.description: Wind speed estimator mode (0- One-second low pass filtered hub height wind speed, 1- Immersion and Invariance Estimator (Ortega et al.)

PS_Mode.description: Pitch saturation mode (0- no pitch saturation, 1- peak shaving, 2- Cp-maximizing pitch saturation, 3- peak shaving and Cp-maximizing pitch saturation)

SD_Mode.description: Shutdown mode (0- no shutdown procedure, 1- pitch to max pitch at shutdown)

TD_Mode.description: Tower damper mode (0- no tower damper, 1- feed back translational nacelle accelleration to pitch angle

TRA_Mode.description: Tower resonance avoidance mode (0- no tower resonsnace avoidance, 1- use torque control setpoints to avoid a specific frequency

Fl_Mode.description: Floating specific feedback mode (0- no nacelle velocity feedback, 1 - nacelle velocity feedback, 2 - nacelle pitching acceleration feedback)

Flp_Mode.description: Flap control mode (0- no flap control, 1- steady state flap angle, 2- Proportional flap control)

PwC_Mode.description: Active Power Control Mode (0- no active power control 1- constant active power control, 2- open loop power vs time, 3- open loop power vs. wind speed)

ZMQ_Mode.description: ZMQ Mode (0 - ZMQ Inteface, 1 - ZMQ for yaw control)

PA_Mode.description: Pitch actuator mode {0 - not used, 1 - first order filter, 2 - second order filter}

PF_Mode.description: Pitch fault mode {0 - not used, 1 - constant offset on one or more blades}

OL_Mode.description: Open loop control mode {0- no open loop control, 1- open loop control}

AWC_Mode.description: Active wake control mode {0 - not used, 1 - SNL method, 2 - NREL method}

Ext_Mode.description: External control mode [0 - not used, 1 - call external dynamic library]

CC_Mode.description: Cable control mode [0- unused, 1- User defined, 2- Open loop control]

StC_Mode.description: Structural control mode [0- unused, 1- User defined, 2- Open loop control]

U_pc.description: List of wind speeds to schedule pitch control zeta and omega

zeta_pc.description: List of pitch controller desired damping ratio at U_pc [-]

omega_pc.description: List of pitch controller desired natural frequency at U_pc [rad/s]

interp_type.description: Type of interpolation between above rated tuning values (only used for multiple pitch controller tuning values)

ss_vsgain.description: Torque controller setpoint smoother gain bias percentage [%, <= 1 ], {default = 100%}

ss_pcgain.description: Pitch controller setpoint smoother gain bias percentage  [%, <= 1 ], {default = 0.1%}

sd_maxpit.description: Maximum blade pitch angle to initiate shutdown [rad], {default = 40 deg.}

twr_freq.description: Tower natural frequency, for floating only

ptfm_freq.description: Platform natural frequency, for floating only

PC_GS_n.description: Number of pitch angle gain scheduling breakpoints

U_Fl.description: List of wind speeds for tuning floating feedback, or "all" for all above-rated wind speeds

flp_kp_norm.description: Flap controller normalization term for DC gain (kappa)

flp_tau.description: Flap controller time constant for integral gain

IPC_Vramp.description: wind speeds for IPC cut-in sigma function [m/s]

rgn2k_factor.description: Factor on VS_Rgn2K to increase/decrease optimal torque control gain, default is 1.  Sometimes environmental conditions or differences in BEM solvers necessitate this change.

f_lpf_cornerfreq.description: Corner frequency (-3dB point) in the first order low pass filter of the generator speed [rad/s]

f_lpf_damping.description: Damping ratio in the first order low pass filter of the generator speed [-]

f_we_cornerfreq.description: Corner frequency (-3dB point) in the first order low pass filter for the wind speed estimate [rad/s]

f_fl_highpassfreq.description: Natural frequency of first-order high-pass filter for nacelle fore-aft motion [rad/s]

f_ss_cornerfreq.description: First order low-pass filter cornering frequency for setpoint smoother [rad/s]

f_yawerr.description: Low pass filter corner frequency for yaw controller [rad/

f_sd_cornerfreq.description: Cutoff Frequency for first order low-pass filter for blade pitch angle [rad/s], {default = 0.41888 ~ time constant of 15s}

flag.description: Flag to use open loop control

filename.description: Filename of open loop input that ROSCO reads

Ind_Breakpoint.description: Index (column, 1-indexed) of breakpoint (time) in open loop index

Ind_BldPitch.description: Indices (columns, 1-indexed) of pitch (1,2,3) inputs in open loop input

Ind_GenTq.description: Index (column, 1-indexed) of generator torque in open loop input

Ind_YawRate.description: Index (column, 1-indexed) of nacelle yaw in open loop input

Ind_Azimuth.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the desired azimuth position in rad (used if OL_Mode = 2)

Ind_CableControl.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the cable control inputs in m

Ind_StructControl.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the structural control inputs in various units

DISCON.description: These are pass-through parameters for the DISCON.IN file.  Use with caution. Do not set defaults in schema.

LoggingLevel.description: (0- write no debug files, 1- write standard output .dbg-file, 2- write standard output .dbg-file and complete avrSWAP-array .dbg2-file)

Echo.description: 0 - no Echo, 1 - Echo input data to <RootName>.echo

DT_Out.description: Time step to output .dbg* files, or 0 to match sampling period of OpenFAST

Ext_Interface.description: 0 - use standard bladed interface, 1 - Use the extened DLL interface introduced in OpenFAST 3.5.0.

F_LPFType.description: 1- first-order low-pass filter, 2- second-order low-pass filter (currently filters generator speed and pitch control signals

VS_ControlMode.description: Generator torque control mode in above rated conditions (0- no torque control, 1- k*omega^2 with PI transitions, 2- WSE TSR Tracking, 3- Power-based TSR Tracking)

VS_ConstPower.description: Do constant power torque control, where above rated torque varies

F_NotchType.description: Notch on the measured generator speed and/or tower fore-aft motion (for floating) (0- disable, 1- generator speed, 2- tower-top fore-aft motion, 3- generator speed and tower-top fore-aft motion)

IPC_ControlMode.description: Turn Individual Pitch Control (IPC) for fatigue load reductions (pitch contribution) (0- off, 1- 1P reductions, 2- 1P+2P reductions)

PC_ControlMode.description: Blade pitch control mode (0- No pitch, fix to fine pitch, 1- active PI blade pitch control)

Y_ControlMode.description: Yaw control mode (0- no yaw control, 1- yaw rate control, 2- yaw-by-IPC)

SS_Mode.description: Setpoint Smoother mode (0- no setpoint smoothing, 1- introduce setpoint smoothing)

WE_Mode.description: Wind speed estimator mode (0- One-second low pass filtered hub height wind speed, 1- Immersion and Invariance Estimator, 2- Extended Kalman Filter)

PS_Mode.description: Pitch saturation mode (0- no pitch saturation, 1- implement pitch saturation)

SD_Mode.description: Shutdown mode (0- no shutdown procedure, 1- pitch to max pitch at shutdown)

Fl_Mode.description: Floating specific feedback mode (0- no nacelle velocity feedback, 1- feed back translational velocity, 2- feed back rotational veloicty)

Flp_Mode.description: Flap control mode (0- no flap control, 1- steady state flap angle, 2- Proportional flap control)

OL_Mode.description: Open loop control mode (0 - no open-loop control, 1 - direct open loop control, 2 - rotor position control)

F_LPFCornerFreq.description: Corner frequency (-3dB point) in the low-pass filters,

F_NumNotchFilts.description: Number of notch filters placed on sensors

F_NotchFreqs.description: Natural frequency of the notch filters. Array with length F_NumNotchFilts

F_NotchBetaNum.description: Damping value of numerator (determines the width of notch). Array with length F_NumNotchFilts, [-]

F_NotchBetaDen.description: Damping value of denominator (determines the depth of notch). Array with length F_NumNotchFilts, [-]

F_GenSpdNotch_N.description: Number of notch filters on generator speed

F_TwrTopNotch_N.description: Number of notch filters on tower top acceleration signal

F_GenSpdNotch_Ind.description: Indices of notch filters on generator speed

F_TwrTopNotch_Ind.description: Indices of notch filters on tower top acceleration signal

F_SSCornerFreq.description: Corner frequency (-3dB point) in the first order low pass filter for the setpoint smoother,

F_WECornerFreq.description: Corner frequency (-3dB point) in the first order low pass filter for the wind speed estimate

F_FlCornerFreq.description: Natural frequency and damping in the second order low pass filter of the tower-top fore-aft motion for floating feedback control

F_FlHighPassFreq.description: Natural frequency of first-order high-pass filter for nacelle fore-aft motion

F_FlpCornerFreq.description: Corner frequency and damping in the second order low pass filter of the blade root bending moment for flap control

PC_GS_KP.description: Gain-schedule table- pitch controller kp gains

PC_GS_KI.description: Gain-schedule table- pitch controller ki gains

PC_GS_KD.description: Gain-schedule table- pitch controller kd gains

PC_GS_TF.description: Gain-schedule table- pitch controller tf gains (derivative filter)

PC_MaxRat.description: Maximum pitch rate (in absolute value) in pitch controller

PC_MinRat.description: Minimum pitch rate (in absolute value) in pitch controller

PC_RefSpd.description: Desired (reference) HSS speed for pitch controller

PC_Switch.description: Angle above lowest minimum pitch angle for switch

IPC_IntSat.description: Integrator saturation (maximum signal amplitude contribution to pitch from IPC)

IPC_SatMode.description: IPC Saturation method (0 - no saturation, 1 - saturate by PC_MinPit, 2 - saturate by PS_BldPitchMin)

IPC_KP.description: Proportional gain for the individual pitch controller- first parameter for 1P reductions, second for 2P reductions, [-]

IPC_KI.description: Integral gain for the individual pitch controller- first parameter for 1P reductions, second for 2P reductions, [-]

IPC_aziOffset.description: Phase offset added to the azimuth angle for the individual pitch controller

IPC_CornerFreqAct.description: Corner frequency of the first-order actuators model, to induce a phase lag in the IPC signal (0- Disable)

VS_GenEff.description: Generator efficiency mechanical power -> electrical power, should match the efficiency defined in the generator properties
