VS_ArSatTq.description: Above rated generator torque PI control saturation

VS_MaxRat.description: Maximum torque rate (in absolute value) in torque controller

VS_MaxTq.description: Maximum generator torque in Region 3 (HSS side)

VS_Rgn2K.description: Generator torque constant in Region 2 (HSS side). Only used in VS_ControlMode = 1,3

VS_n.description: Number of generator PI torque controller gains

VS_KP.description: Proportional gain for generator PI torque controller. (Only used in the transitional 2.5 region if VS_ControlMode =/ 2)

VS_KI.description: Integral gain for generator PI torque controller  (Only used in the transitional 2.5 region if VS_ControlMode =/ 2)

VS_TSRopt.description: Power-maximizing region 2 tip-speed-ratio. Only used in VS_ControlMode = 2.

VS_PwrFiltF.description: Low pass filter on power used to determine generator speed set point.  Only used in VS_ControlMode = 3.

SS_VSGain.description: Variable speed torque controller setpoint smoother gain

SS_PCGain.description: Collective pitch controller setpoint smoother gain

PRC_Mode.description: Power reference tracking mode, 0- use standard rotor speed set points, 1- use PRC rotor speed setpoints

PRC_WindSpeeds.description: Array of wind speeds used in rotor speed vs. wind speed lookup table [m/s]

PRC_GenSpeeds.description: Array of generator speeds corresponding to PRC_WindSpeeds [rad/s]

PRC_LPF_Freq.description: Frequency of the low pass filter on the wind speed estimate used to set PRC_GenSpeeds [rad/s]

PRC_n.description: Number of elements in PRC_WindSpeeds and PRC_GenSpeeds array

TRA_ExclBand.description: Size of the rotor frequency exclusion band [LSS, rad/s]. Torque controller reference will be TRA_ExclSpeed +/- TRA_ExlBand/2

TRA_RateLimit.description: Rate limit of change in rotor speed reference [LSS, rad/s].  Suggested to be VS_RefSpd/400.

WE_BladeRadius.description: Blade length (distance from hub center to blade tip)

WE_CP_n.description: Amount of parameters in the Cp array

WE_CP.description: Parameters that define the parameterized CP(lambda) function

WE_Gamma.description: Adaption gain of the wind speed estimator algorithm

WE_Jtot.description: Total drivetrain inertia, including blades, hub and casted generator inertia to LSS

PerfFileName.description: File containing rotor performance tables (Cp,Ct,Cq) (absolute path or relative to this file)

PerfTableSize.description: Size of rotor performance tables, first number refers to number of blade pitch angles, second number referse to number of tip-speed ratios

WE_FOPoles_N.description: Number of first-order system poles used in EKF

WE_FOPoles_v.description: Wind speeds corresponding to first-order system poles

Y_ErrThresh.description: Yaw error threshold. Turbine begins to yaw when it passes this

Y_IPC_IntSat.description: Integrator saturation (maximum signal amplitude contribution to pitch from yaw-by-IPC)

Y_IPC_omegaLP.description: Low-pass filter corner frequency for the Yaw-by-IPC controller to filtering the yaw alignment error

Y_IPC_zetaLP.description: Low-pass filter damping factor for the Yaw-by-IPC controller to filtering the yaw alignment error.

Y_omegaLPFast.description: Corner frequency fast low pass filter, 1.0

Y_omegaLPSlow.description: Corner frequency slow low pass filter, 1/60

FA_KI.description: Integral gain for the fore-aft tower damper controller, -1 = off / >0 = on

FA_HPFCornerFreq.description: Corner frequency (-3dB point) in the high-pass filter on the fore-aft acceleration signal

FA_IntSat.description: Integrator saturation (maximum signal amplitude contribution to pitch from FA damper)

PS_BldPitchMin_N.description: Number of values in minimum blade pitch lookup table (should equal number of values in PS_WindSpeeds and PS_BldPitchMin)

PS_WindSpeeds.description: Wind speeds corresponding to minimum blade pitch angles

SD_MaxPit.description: Maximum blade pitch angle to initiate shutdown

SD_CornerFreq.description: Cutoff Frequency for first order low-pass filter for blade pitch angle

Fl_n.description: Number of Fl_Kp gains in gain scheduling, optional with default of 1

Fl_U.description: Wind speeds for scheduling Fl_Kp, optional if Fl_Kp is single value [m/s]

Flp_Angle.description: Initial or steady state flap angle

Flp_Kp.description: Blade root bending moment proportional gain for flap control

Flp_Ki.description: Flap displacement integral gain for flap control

OL_Filename.description: Input file with open loop timeseries (absolute path or relative to this file)

Ind_Breakpoint.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the breakpoint (time if OL_Mode > 0)

Ind_BldPitch.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the blade pitch input in rad

Ind_GenTq.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the generator torque in Nm

Ind_YawRate.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the generator torque in Nm

Ind_Azimuth.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the desired azimuth position in rad (used if OL_Mode = 2)

RP_Gains.description: PID gains and Tf of derivative for rotor position control (used if OL_Mode = 2)

Ind_CableControl.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the cable control inputs in m

Ind_StructControl.description: The column in OL_Filename that contains the structural control inputs in various units

DLL_FileName.description: Name/location of the dynamic library {.dll [Windows] or .so [Linux]} in the Bladed-DLL format

DLL_InFile.description: Name of input file sent to the DLL

DLL_ProcName.description: Name of procedure in DLL to be called

PF_Offsets.description: Pitch angle offsets for each blade (array with length of 3)

CC_GroupIndex.description: First index for cable control group, should correspond to deltaL

StC_GroupIndex.description: First index for structural control group, options specified in ServoDyn summary output

AWC_Mode.description: Active wake control mode {0 - not used, 1 - complex number method, 2 - Coleman transformation method}

AWC_n.description: AWC azimuthal number (only used in complex number method)

AWC_harmonic.description: AWC Coleman transform harmonic (only used in Coleman transform method)

ZMQ_UpdatePeriod.description: Update period at zmq interface to send measurements and wait for setpoint [sec.]

tuning_yaml.description: yaml file to tune the ROSCO controller, only used for control-only optimizations using an OpenFAST model.  Absolute path or relative to modeling input.

linmodel_tuning.description: Inputs used for tuning ROSCO using linear (level 2) models

type.description: Type of level 2 based tuning - robust gain scheduling (robust) or simulation based optimization (simulation)

linfile_path.description: Path to OpenFAST linearization (.lin) files, if they exist

lintune_outpath.description: Path for outputs from linear model based tuning

min.description: Desired maximum allowable omega for robust tuning. Array must be of length U_pc.

max.description: Desired maximum allowable omega for robust tuning. Array must be of length U_pc.
